name: .SAVER File Extension
summary: Learn about .SAVER files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Screen saver for Mac OS X; runs when the computer has been idle for a specific amount of time; may be included with the Mac OS X operating system or created by a third-party developer.

content: Apple screen saver files are typically stored in the /System/Library/Screen Savers directory. Third-party screen savers that have been installed by the user are saved in the ~/Library/Screen Savers folder.
Screen saver settings can be customized by opening System Preferences and selecting the "Desktop & Screen Saver" Preference Pane.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
